name: Turbo Addons Elementor
author: Turbo Addons

sections.installation:
1. Download the Plugin:

    • Download the turbo-addons-elementor.zip file from the https://wordpress.org/plugins/turbo-addons-elementor/ or the WordPress plugin repository.

  2. Upload the Plugin:

    • Go to your WordPress admin dashboard.
    • Navigate to Plugins > Add New.
    • Click Upload Plugin and choose the turbo-addons-elementor.zip file you downloaded.

  3. Activate the Plugin:

    • After the installation is complete, click Activate to enable the plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Added 6 new widgets:
    1. Icon Button
    2. Section Divider
    3. Social Bar
    4. Most Top Bar
    5. Review Star
    6. Count Down Timer

1.0.0

  • Initial release with 6 advanced widgets for Elementor.
sections.description:
Turbo Addons Elementor Turbo Addons Elementor Turbo Addons for Elementor is a feature-rich collection of advanced widgets designed to enhance the functionality of Elementor, one of the most popular WordPress page builders.

Key Features

Turbo Addons for Elementor offers the following widgets:

  1. Pricing Table – Easily switch between monthly and yearly pricing plans with a toggle option.Highlight your most popular pricing plans to attract customers.
  2. Animated Text Effects – Apply dynamic text animation styles to your content for a more engaging user experience.
  3. Contact Info – Display your website’s contact information in a clean and organized way.
  4. Heading – Customize stylish section and paragraph headings for better visual structure.
  5. Popular Post – Showcase a list of your most popular blog posts in any section of your website.
  6. Preview Card – Create cards featuring an image, heading, description, and call-to-action button.
  7. Icon Button – Design buttons with customizable icons to enhance interactivity.
  8. Section Divider – Add visually appealing dividers between content sections.
  9. Social Bar – Showcase social media icons for easy sharing and connecting with visitors.
  10. Most Top Bar – Add an information bar at the top of your website with details like contact info, announcements, or special offers.
  11. Review Star – Include star rating widgets to display customer reviews and testimonials.
  12. Count Down Timer – Set up countdown timers for promotions, product launches, or events to create urgency.

Usage

  1. Add a Widget:

    • Go to any post or page editor where Elementor is active.
    • Open the Elementor editor by clicking Edit with Elementor.
    • Find the Turbo Addons Elementor widgets under the Turbo Addons category in the Elementor widget panel.
    • Drag and drop the desired widget onto your page.

  2. Customize Widget Settings:

    • Click on the widget to open its settings panel.
    • Customize the widget’s appearance, content, and functionality as needed.

  3. Publish or Update:

    • Once you are satisfied with your page or post, click Publish or Update to save your changes.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

Q: Do I need Elementor Pro to use Turbo Addons Elementor?

A: No, Turbo Addons Elementor works with the free version of Elementor. However, some features may be enhanced with Elementor Pro.

Q: How do I get support for Turbo Addons Elementor?

A: For support, please visit https://turbo-addons.com/contact/ or contact us through the WordPress support forum.

Q: Can I use Turbo Addons Elementor on multiple sites?

A: Yes, Turbo Addons Elementor is licensed under GPL v2 or later, allowing you to use it on multiple sites.

License

Turbo Addons Elementor is licensed under the GNU General Public License v2 or later. See the LICENSE for more details.
